<<<<<<< HEAD
His Majesties letter and declaration to the sheriffes and Citty of London. Ianuary 17. 1642. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
[2], 6 p.
Printed, by His Majesties command, at Oxford, Ianuary 18. By Leonard Lichfield Printer to the Vniversity, [Oxford] : 1642 [i.e. 1643]
The only genuine Oxford edition; first line of text reads: Trusty and wellbeloved. cf. Madan. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

The only genuine Oxford edition; first line of text reads: Trusty and wellbeloved. cf. Madan. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
